EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-05-02-Turbonomic-6-1-Prospects-1.Prospect Send
EmailTemplate.subject: Got Automation? Announcing Turbonomic 6.1
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
What would it mean for your career if you could deliver:
- Application response time improvements of 35% - While increasing datacenter utilization by at least 30% - While simultaneously saving up to 40% on your cloud bills?
These results aren’t magic – they’re AI-powered automation. Our new release, Turbonomic 6.1 <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/introducing-turbonomic-6-1]]>, is loaded with features that not only enhance workload efficiency and performance but also make it easier to get started on your automation journey.
To learn more, please check out our 6.1 Learning Center <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/introducing-turbonomic-6-1]]> and join one or more of our “6.1 LIVE” events:
- Wed. 5/9: Live Demo: Automating AWS Reserved Instance Utilization <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/continuous-aws-ri-consumption/]]> (15 min) - Wed. 5/16: Live Demo: Delivering Application-Aware Infrastructure <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/true-application-aware-infrastructure/]]> (15 min) - Wed. 5/23: Live Webinar: Using AI to Maximize Cloud Savings <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/using-artificial-intelligence-to-cut-cloud-costs/]]> (60 min) - Wed. 5/30: Live Webinar: Self-Managing Kubernetes with Turbonomic 6.1 <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/using-ai-to-optimize-kubernetes-clusters]]> (60 min)
Regards, Team Turbonomic
